12px;margin:0;word-break:normal;display:block;overflow-x:auto;color:#333;background:#f8f8f8&#125;.markdown-body a&#123;color:#4dd0e1;border-bottom:1px solid em&#123;font-style:normal;color:#4dd0e1;font-weight:700&#125;.markdown-body table&#123;display:inline-block!important;font-size:12px;width:auto;max-width:100%;overflow:auto;border:1px solid #f6f6f6&#125;.markdown-body thead&#123;background:#f6f6f6;color:#000;text-align:left&#125;.markdown-body tr:nth-child(2n)&#123;background-color:rgba(77,208,225,.05)&#125;.markdown-body #26c6da;background:rgba(77,208,225,.15);position:relative&#125;.markdown-body blockquote:before&#123;content:"❝";top:8px;left:8px;color:#4dd0e1;font-size:30px;line-height:1;font-weight:700;position:absolute;opacity:.7&#125;.markdown-body blockquote:after&#123;content:"❞";font-size:30px;position:absolute;right:8px;bottom:0;color:#4dd0e1;opacity:.7&#125;.markdown-body blockquote p&#123;color:#595959;line-height:2&#125;.markdown-body ol,.markdown-body ul&#123;color:#595959;padding-left:28px&#125;.markdown-body ol li,.markdown-body ul li&#123;margin-bottom:0;list-style:inherit&#125;.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item&#123;list-style:none&#125;.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item ol,.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item ul,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item ol,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item ul&#123;margin-top:0&#125;.markdown-body ol ol,.markdown-body ol ul,.markdown-body ul ol,.markdown-body ul ul&#123;margin-top:3px&#125;.markdown-body ol li&#123;padding-left:6px&#125;@media (max-width:720px)&#123;.markdown-body h1&#123;font-size:24px&#125;.markdown-body h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><blockquote>
<p>在开发一个取件的小程序与 nodejs 服务端的过程中发现，如果使用网上现有的二维码生成 API ，存在某些问题比如请求需要较长时间，数据格式较为固定，由于整体业务上也不需要二维码的风格化，最好可以前端与 nodejs 服务端通用。</p>
</blockquote>
<p>经过简单的调研选择了 <strong>QRCode.js</strong></p>
<p><a href="https://github.com/soldair/node-qrcode" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">QRCode.js 项目</a></p>
<p>QRCode.js 是一个用于生成二维码的 JavaScript 库。主要是通过获取 DOM 的标签,再通过 HTML5 Canvas 绘制而成,不依赖任何库。他支持 nodejs 端，浏览器端，以及小程序端。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-0">1. 安装 QRCode.js</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">npm install --save qrcode
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">2. 配置生成二维码的属性</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> QRCode = <span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'qrcode'</span>)
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> options = &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">errorCorrectionLevel</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'H'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'terminal'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">quality</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0.95</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">color</span>: &#123;
        <span class="hljs-attr">dark</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'#000'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">light</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'#FFF'</span>,
    &#125;,
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<ul>
<li><strong>errorCorrectionLevel</strong>：纠错功能使您即使符号变脏或损坏也能成功扫描QR码。</li>
</ul>
<p>根据操作环境，有四个级别可供选择。</p>

























<table><thead><tr><th>Level</th><th align="center">Error resistance</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><strong>L</strong> (Low)</td><td align="center"><strong>~7%</strong></td></tr><tr><td><strong>M</strong> (Medium)</td><td align="center"><strong>~15%</strong></td></tr><tr><td><strong>Q</strong> (Quartile)</td><td align="center"><strong>~25%</strong></td></tr><tr><td><strong>H</strong> (High)</td><td align="center"><strong>~30%</strong></td></tr></tbody></table>
<p>级别越高，提供的抗错误性越好，但会降低符号的容量</p>








































<table><thead><tr><th>Mode</th><th>L</th><th>M</th><th>Q</th><th>H</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>Numeric</td><td>7089</td><td>5596</td><td>3993</td><td>3057</td></tr><tr><td>Alphanumeric</td><td>4296</td><td>3391</td><td>2420</td><td>1852</td></tr><tr><td>Byte</td><td>2953</td><td>2331</td><td>1663</td><td>1273</td></tr><tr><td>Kanji</td><td>1817</td><td>1435</td><td>1024</td><td>784</td></tr></tbody></table>
<ul>
<li><strong>color</strong>：指定QR码图像的颜色</li>
</ul>
<p>dark：二维码主体颜色，light：二维码背景颜色</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><strong>Type</strong>：指定期望的输出类型，例如数据URL中的 image / png，image / jpeg，image / webp和utf8，SVG，字符串中的终端。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>quality</strong>：设置图像的质量，范围为0-1。 默认值为0.92，仅适用于image / jpeg和image / webp类型</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>width</strong>：设置图像的边长</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>如果width太小而不能包含二维码的全部信息符号，则此选项将被忽略。</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><strong>margin</strong>：设置图像的外边框距离</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>scale</strong>：设置每几个像素为一个信息点默认为 4</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">3. 设置输出</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-3">浏览器端的使用方法</h3>
<p>可以通过渲染到 Canvas 画布进行使用</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html copyable" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">html</span>></span>
  <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">body</span>></span>
    <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">canvas</span> <span class="hljs-attr">id</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"canvas"</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">canvas</span>></span>
    <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">script</span> <span class="hljs-attr">src</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"bundle.js"</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">script</span>></span>
  <span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">body</span>></span>
<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">html</span>></span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>使用前需要使用打包工具构建依赖</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> QRCode = <span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'qrcode'</span>)
<span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> canvas = <span class="hljs-built_in">document</span>.getElementById(<span class="hljs-string">'canvas'</span>)

QRCode.toCanvas(canvas, <span class="hljs-string">'sample text'</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">error</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (error) <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(error)
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">'success!'</span>);
&#125;)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>或者直接渲染 base64 或者 图像文件 （png ，svg ，jpeg）</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-4">nodejs-server 端常见使用方法</h3>
<p><strong>转成终端可输出的字符串</strong></p>
<p><code>toString(text, [options], [cb(error, string)])</code>
返回QR码的字符串表示形式。
如果选择的输出格式是svg，它将返回一个包含xml代码的字符串。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">
QRCode.toString([
    &#123; <span class="hljs-attr">data</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'qrcode test in nodejs'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">mode</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'byte'</span> &#125;,
]
).then(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">qrImage</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"terminal"</span>, qrImage)
&#125;).catch(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(err)
&#125;)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><strong>转成包含二维码图片信息的 Base64 编码 url</strong>
<code>toDataURL(text, [options], [cb(error, url)])</code>
返回包含QR码图像表示形式的数据URI。
目前仅适用于 image / png类型。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">QRCode.toDataURL(<span class="hljs-string">'qrcode test in nodejs'</span>, options).then(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">qrImage</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"URL"</span>, qrImage)
&#125;).catch(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(err)
&#125;)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><strong>转成图片形式存储</strong>
toFile(path, text, [options], [cb(error)])</p>
<p>将QR Code保存到图像文件。
如果未指定options.type，则将从文件扩展名中猜测格式。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">QRCode.toFile(<span class="hljs-string">'./images/qrCode.png'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"qrcode test in nodejs"</span>, options)
    .then(<span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"success"</span>)
    &#125;).catch(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span> =></span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(err)
    &#125;)

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><strong>完整 node-server 端 demo</strong></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> QRCode = <span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'qrcode'</span>)

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> options = &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">errorCorrectionLevel</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'H'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">type</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'terminal'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">quality</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0.95</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">color</span>: &#123;
        <span class="hljs-attr">dark</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'#000'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">light</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'#FFF'</span>,
    &#125;,
&#125;

QRCode.toString([
    &#123; <span class="hljs-attr">data</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'qrcode test in nodejs'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">mode</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'byte'</span> &#125;,
]
).then(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">qrImage</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"terminal"</span>, qrImage)
&#125;).catch(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(err)
&#125;)

QRCode.toDataURL(<span class="hljs-string">'qrcode test in nodejs'</span>, options).then(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">qrImage</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"URL"</span>, qrImage)
&#125;).catch(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(err)
&#125;)

QRCode.toFile(<span class="hljs-string">'./images/qrCode.svg'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">"qrcode test in nodejs"</span>, options)
    .then(<span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"success"</span>)
    &#125;).catch(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span> =></span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(err)
    &#125;)

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>QRcode 同时支持 ES5 / ES6 / ES7 的语法</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> QRCode <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'qrcode'</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">// With Callback</span>
QRCode.toString(<span class="hljs-string">'http://www.google.com'</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">err, string</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (err) <span class="hljs-keyword">throw</span> err
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(string)
&#125;)
<span class="hljs-comment">// With promises</span>
QRCode.toDataURL(<span class="hljs-string">'I am a pony!'</span>)
  .then(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">url</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(url)
  &#125;)
  .catch(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(err)
  &#125;)

<span class="hljs-comment">// With async/await</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> generateQR = <span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> text => &#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> QRCode.toDataURL(text))
  &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span> (err) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(err)
  &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-5">在微信小程序中使用</h3>
<h4 data-id="heading-6">yingye 老师提供的方案 weapp.qrcode.js</h4>
<p><a href="https://github.com/yingye/weapp-qrcode" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">weapp.qrcode.js</a></p>
<p>先在 wxml 文件中，创建绘制的 canvas，并定义好 width, height, canvasId 。</p>
<p>
直接引入 js 文件，使用 drawQrcode() 绘制二维码。</p>
<p>由于目前微信小程序已全面支持 npm ，可以选择直接安装，记得要构建 npm 包</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">npm install weapp-qrcode --save

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>基本使用</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> drawQrcode <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'weapp-qrcode'</span>

drawQrcode(&#123;
  <span class="hljs-attr">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">200</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">height</span>: <span class="hljs-number">200</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">canvasId</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'myQrcode'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">text</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'https://github.com/yingye'</span>
&#125;)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-7">快速生成条码和二维码的方案</h4>
<p><a href="https://github.com/alsey/wxbarcode" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">wxbarcode</a></p>
<p>安装</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">$ npm install wxbarcode
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>使用方法</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> wxbarcode <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'wxbarcode'</span>

wxbarcode.barcode(<span class="hljs-string">'barcode'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'1234567890123456789'</span>, <span class="hljs-number">680</span>, <span class="hljs-number">200</span>);
wxbarcode.qrcode(<span class="hljs-string">'qrcode'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'1234567890123456789'</span>, <span class="hljs-number">420</span>, <span class="hljs-number">420</span>);
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><strong>条形码</strong></p>
<p>函数名：barcode</p>
<p>函数原型：barcode(id, code, width, height)</p>
<p>参数：</p>
<ul>
<li>id: wxml文件中的 Canvas ID</li>
<li>code: 用于生成条形码的字符串</li>
<li>width: 生成的条形码宽度，单位 rpx</li>
<li>height: 生成的条形码高度，单位 rpx</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>二维码</strong></p>
<p>函数名：qrcode</p>
<p>函数原型：qrcode(id, code, width, height)</p>
<p>参数：</p>
<ul>
<li>id: wxml文件中的 Canvas ID</li>
<li>code: 用于生成二维码的字符串</li>
<li>width: 生成的二维码宽度，单位 rpx</li>
<li>height: 生成的二维码高度，单位 rpx</li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-8">总结</h2>
<p>调研了很多解决方案，node-qrcode 解决了我大部分问题。小程序社区也有很多的方案，也可以在跨端框架中使用，由于不是生产级项目也没有去调研尝试。但基本应该足以满足需求。</p>
